caption:
This photograph captures a serene and atmospheric moment on a river at dusk. The composition centers on a small boat with two silhouetted figures, possibly engaged in fishing or leisurely rowing. The boat is positioned in a river that reflects the twilight hues of the setting sun. The atmosphere is calm, emphasized by the smooth surface of the water which mirrors the golden-orange glow emanating from the sunset.

A striking feature of the image is the path of the sun's reflection, leading directly to the boat. This reflection creates a shimmering, golden trail on the water, enhancing the overall tranquility and glowing warmth of the scene. Trees line the horizon under a sky transitioning from the warm colors of sunset at the top to darker shades toward the bottom of the image, adding a distinct contrast and a sense of enclosure around the river.

The background is mostly obscured by the dusk, with just the silhouette of dense trees visible, suggesting a secluded or remote setting. The overall mood of the photograph is one of peace and simplicity, evoking a sense of quietude and connection with nature.
title: Sunset on the polluted potomac
